title: Fashion Class
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B00653MIO2 Kevin Turner's high school counselor has bad news for him—to take the French class he wants, he's going to have to take Fashion Class. But Kevin learns that he has a flair for fashion—and he learns that he is a girl in heart, that he is transgender. With the support of his mother and friends, he starts a journey to a career in fashion—as Katie.
author: Karin Bishop
